1.content: You had just arrived at your job at the Blue Panther daycare. You had a very nice night before and you were ready to start another day. You walked inside and were greeted by your coworkers. You had been working here for about four months and were loved pretty much by everyone. After a few minutes of helping get set up for the day, you suddenly felt really dizzy and blacked out. Upon waking up, you began to hear the sounds of...
1.title: On Your Marks....Get Set...STINK!

11.content: You could hear the sounds of screaming toddlers. However, you knew your daycare only took one gender. Which one was it again?
11.title: Toddlers (Age 1-3)

choices: You have become one of the toddlers!
You are no longer human-you are an object!
111.content: You hear the unmistakable squeals and babbling of the younger boys. But something doesn’t feel right, you are still trying to adjust your sight. When you can finally see clearly, you see that you were right, there were lots of younger boy with one or two workers. One of them is rocking a one year old boy to sleep, while you see the other one holding her nose in anguish as she changes a 2 year old’s stinky poop-filled diaper. In a corner you see two 3 year olds with pull-ups around their ankles sitting on potties. But the more noticeable and concerning thing is...
111.title: Boys

choices: You are in someone else's body.
1111.content: Are you yourself, but as a toddler, or someone you know?
1111.title: You have become one of the toddlers!

11111.content: You have become a toddler, of about 3 years old, perhaps closer to three. You're dressed in a forest green T-shirt, and dark blue jeans. You're also wearing sneakers. However, there is one last thing to check. You go into a secliuded place, and pull your pants down. You find...
11111.title: You are yourself, but younger.

choices: These are... training undies! They're thicker and slightly more absorbent!
111111.content: Oh, thank goodness. You're in undies. Wait, you put your hand in to feel around in them...
111111.title: Underwear

choices: Rough, accident-prone but vaguely there control.
111112.content:
Oh no, oh no oh no oh no. You're in a diaper.

You quickly pull your pants back up and waddle over to the bathroom. Do you still have your adult bladder control? Of are you stuck in these diapers?
111112.title: A diaper

1111123.content: You have moderate control over your bladder and bowels. Its not perfect, but you'd be able to hold it in enough to use the bathroom. You enter, and lower your jeans and diaper. You sigh in relief as you pee into the urinal. After that, you head to...
1111123.title: Moderate control.

11111231.content: Looks like the next class is Art. Given what's on the table, it would seem today's focus is on...
11111231.title: Art

111112311.content: Today was the focus of clay. They were making...
111112311.title: Clay.

1111123111.content:
Well, insomuch statues as random globs of clay that looked like things. Most of the toddlers just put it in funny places, like their hair, or noses, or inside their diapers.

What do you try and make with your clay?
1111123111.title: Statues

11111232.content:
You get called to the front office-your parents are picking you up.

Have you gone back in time, to when you were 3? Or have you just been de-aged, and your parents are as old as they were now?
11111232.title: Home

111112321.content: You've time traveled back in time to when you were three. Your parents pick you up, and you are driven...
111112321.title: Time travel!

choices: Only a little, as if you'd just started training. 10-30%.
111113.content:
Well, that's a suprise.

You're in a Pull-Up.

Upside: You at least have *some* bladder control.

Downside: You obviously don't have enough, else you'd be in undies.

How much control do you have?
111113.title: A Pull-Up

choices: You're one of the 1 year olds...
You're one of the 2 year olds...

info.brief_description: You are working for a daycare when things take a...rather stinky turn for the worst.
info.description:
You are a worker for the Blue Panther Daycare. You had been working for the daycare for about four months and were generally well liked. One Monday, you were setting up for the day with a few other workers when something strange happens. What happens to you is up to your imagination. Just know that you are about to have a very smelly time.

Rules:
1. ALL stink is allowed
2. No genitals may be mentioned PERIOD
3. You are allowed to shrink. HOWEVER, you are not allowed to shrink to less than 4 in.
4. If you are small, the kids may take you home. HOWEVER, if they return to the daycare, then so do you.
5. If the kids do take you home, they and any friends that they make at the daycare are the only ones who are allowed to interact with you.
6. No death.
7. One paragraph MINIMUM. (A paragraph is 8-11 sentences in length)
